These pants were made way too small in the waist. I replaced my original set with the exact same part number and size but these were two sizes too small. Otherwise the pants are as I expected them. I feel like they should’ve offered to modify them for me seeing as how they were not the size indicated.

评论概述: Still Red Kap after all these years
评论详情: Been buying these jean cut Red Kaps for over 25 years, they fit me well. Wore them as a pro mechanic and still wear them around the homeplace in retirement for work pants. I keep them for quite a few years before having to toss them for new ones. When new, they double as nice casual slacks to wear as well instead of blue jeans.
